description:
This compact folding lock is easy to bring along and a nice option to bulky U-Locks. The included mount lets you secure your Bordo uGrip lock by your bike’s bottle cage, or almost anywhere else with the included straps. This little lock acts as a great deterrent when making quick stops in low risk areas.

  • Extra-Class lock cylinder reduces the chance of a picking attack
  • Six 100 x 5mm hardened steel bars are strong and durable
  • Link construction with drill resistant rivets allows for compact folding
  • Soft rubber coating protects your bike’s paint job
  • Includes 2 coded keys
  • Attaches with Velcro straps or screws
  • Abus security rating: 7/15 (suitable for low risk areas/stops)
name: Abus Bordo Lite Mini 6055 Key Folding Lock
